channel.title: War Bush Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Bush Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Jugglers of Death
item.description: USA USA USA USA USA USA USA USA USA USA I sit in my kitchen once again.. having just got back from a juggling show at the Prodigal Son. It was a great time. It was incredible. The audience was receptive.. the juggling went well. We didn’t drop at any pivitol points.. heh. and we got contacts for more gigs. I am very interested in what is going to happen in the marrow.
